== Bio ==
Ole Widar Saastad is Senior Engineer  and work in Research
Infrastructure Services Group Research Infrastructure Services Group is
responsible for national e-infrastructure services for computation,
storage of research data and more. The group is also responsible for
UiO's involvement in national, Nordic and European initiatives and other
cooperation projects and initiatives in the field of e-infrastructure
and scientific computing.
